pokerstars.name: PokerStars
pokerstars.description: Based on current tournament schedules, series like MicroMillions, SCOOP, WCOOP, and daily/weekly events as of August 2025. Buy-ins are listed as distinct values from lowest to highest, with examples where available. Low-stakes events dominate, with high-rollers in major series.

buy_ins.notes: Micro-stakes satellites and qualifiers for larger events.

gg.name: GG Poker
gg.description: Drawing from schedules like GG World Festival, WSOP Online, Bounty Hunters, GGMasters, and daily guarantees as of August 2025. Features innovative formats like bounties and mysteries, with buy-ins from micros to ultra-high rollers.

partypoker.name: PartyPoker
partypoker.description: From schedules including Daily Legends, Monster Series, Powerfest, KO Series, and weekly events like Sunday Party as of August 2025. Emphasizes value with low-to-mid stakes and progressive knockouts.
